article.name: Defend - Administrative Resources
article.title: Defend - Administrative Resources
article.body:
Check out these valuable resources to support you with your Defend deployment and roll-out.

Deployment Guides

Use the guides below to assist you with deploying the Defend console to your organization:

  • Defend - Deployment Center Overview: Learn about the deployment center process and what to expect. 
  • Defend - Feature Analysis: Get an overview of Defend's functionalities. 
  • Defend - Architecture: Learn about Defend's architecture setup and general workflow with your email system.
  • Defend - Data Storage: Learn about how Defend stores your data.
  • Defend - Change Testing: Learn how to verify that the Defend console has been successfully deployed.

Admin Experience

Use these resources to enhance your knowledge and experience of using the Defend console:

Admin Settings

  • Defend - Dashboard: Get an overview of the Defend console's Dashboard page and the data it displays.
  • Defend - Settings: Get an overview of the Settings page and the controls that can be configured.
  • Defend - Allow or Deny Lists: Learn how to create Allow and Deny list entries.
  • Defend - Event Notifications: Learn how to configure event notifications for specific actions.
  • Defend - User Management: Learn about how to add new administrators and their permissions.
  • Defend - Graymail Management: Learn about the Defend console's graymail controls and how to configure them.
  • Defend - Spam Management: Learn about the Defend console's spam controls and how to configure them.
  • Defend - Abuse Mailbox Automation: Learn how to configure the abuse mailbox setting for your organization and users.
  • Defend Product Tours: Take a tour of the Defend console and user experience.
